audioText: Bref, cette pauvre terre aride et désolée ne pourra jamais soutenir une agriculture durable sans des investissements considérables en infrastructure hydraulique et en technologie d'irrigation avancée.
question: What does the speaker conclude about the barren land?
options: It cannot support sustainable agriculture without major investments
It is naturally perfect for all types of farming
It only needs minimal improvements to be productive
It should be abandoned completely as hopeless
explanation: The text states 'Bref, cette pauvre terre aride et désolée ne pourra jamais soutenir une agriculture durable sans des investissements considérables' - In short, this poor arid and desolate land will never be able to support sustainable agriculture without considerable investments. 'Bref' means in short/briefly, 'pauvre' means poor/unfortunate, and 'terre' means land/earth.
source: Agricultural development and land management challenges
